decisions.description: Decides if the Request needs to have a Creative Brief attached. If not, the Request bypasses the file upload screen and goes to the last screen. If yes, the Request will be taken to the file upload screen.
decisions.name: CreativeBriefNeededDecision
decisions.label: CreativeBriefNeededDecision

decisions.description: Decides if the Creative Brief was attached to the Request record. If it, the user will be re-directed back to the file upload screen
decisions.name: CreativeBriefUploaded
decisions.label: CreativeBriefUploaded

decisions.description: Decides which product the Requestor chose to determine which screen to go to next
decisions.name: ProductDecision
decisions.label: ProductDecision

decisions.description: Decides if a Creative team member needs to be notified of a large request
decisions.name: SendLargeRequestEmail
decisions.label: SendLargeRequestEmail

Flow.description: NICC-057703; updated via NICC-062907; updated viaNICC-064110; update via NICC-064361; update via NICC-065010; Screen flow for the Global Creative team to create new Request records
Flow.label: Request - Creative Team Intake Form
